subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: William Beatty, an offensive tackle drafted by the Giants, studies the Bible, cooks, sews, paints portraits, and knocks opposing players on their rear ends in football games.
snippet: William Beatty, an offensive tackle drafted by the Giants, studies the Bible, cooks, sews, paints portraits, and knocks opposing players on their rear ends in football games.
